textBox.richText: Given that this was our second trip to San Francisco, we managed to skip all the touristy sites. Given we were blessed with our own local tour guide we got a great insight into what makes this city tick. Thanks to Rachel for making this leg of the trip wickedly awesome! We enjoyed visiting the pumpkin patches of Half Moon Bay, the boutique shops of Union Street in Cow Hollow, the restaurants in the Mission and Filmore street as well as the diversity of Cole Valley and the Haight. It wasn’t all about eating and shopping - we marvelled at some great views of the Golden Gate Bridge from Lands End and spent a fantastic day experiencing the newly renovated California Academy of Sciences.
